TEXT.TITLE: CASH PORK CALLED MIXED, BEEF HIGHER
TEXT.BODY: Cash bellies are called steady and loins firmer at noon on moderate intrest. However, hams are called sharply lower as Easter business came to a close. Cash beef is higher on farily active demand, according to private sources. ALL PORK PRICES - FOB MIDWEST BASIS. LOINS BELLIES 14-18 98-100 12-14 60 18-22 96 14-16 60 HAMS 16-18 57 14-17 unq CARCASS BEEF 17-20 73 600/700 98 Reuter
